titleInfo.title: The impact on world population growth of possible delays in the decline in fertility: alternative population projections to those of the United Nations. Paper presented to the 13th World Congress of Sociology, symposium V: The environment, technology, and power, session 2 - Population, environment and sustainable livelihood, held at the University of Bielefeld, Germany on July 20, 1994

originInfo.publisher: Univ. Bielefeld, Inst. für Bevölkerungsforschung u. Sozialpolitik

bibliographicCitation.mla: Birg, Herwig. “The impact on world population growth of possible delays in the decline in fertility: alternative population projections to those of the United Nations. Paper presented to the 13th World Congress of Sociology, symposium V: The environment, technology, and power, session 2 - Population, environment and sustainable livelihood, held at the University of Bielefeld, Germany on July 20, 1994”. Presented at the 13th World Congress of Sociology, Bielefeld, Germany, Bielefeld: Univ. Bielefeld, Inst. für Bevölkerungsforschung u. Sozialpolitik, 1994.
